document_data.name: Albitur
document_data.mainbody: '''Albitur''' was a [[pit fiend]] under [[Geryon]]'s command in the mid-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Albitur participated in the counterattack against [[Halaster]] while he scoured [[Avernus]], trying to rescue [[Elminster Aumar]] in {{yearlink|1372}}, when he was the youngest [[pit fiend]] in service of [[Geryon]] (and the most ambitious). He was the head of the first assault, of which none survived.
